Pasco.Bateman Island: Bateman Island is an island located on the Columbia River between the cities of Richland and Kennewick, Washington, in the United States. It is approximately 1 mile (1.6 km) long and 0.5 miles (0.80 km) wide (160 acres (65 ha)) and is part of the city of Richland. Bateman Island was formerly known as Riverview Island.
